articles.author: Mark Johnson, Demetrius Freeman
articles.title: In eagle nirvana, avian flu is decimating America’s national bird - The Washington Post
articles.description: The bald eagle was removed 17 years ago from the endangered species list, signaling the comeback of an iconic species. A new threat imperils that recovery.
articles.content: INTERNATIONAL FALLS, Minn. The research boat thumped over the waves on a crisp June morning, spraying William Bowerman as he peered into 136 square miles of lakes and a cerulean sky in Voyageurs Nati… [+12208 chars]
